markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cadence Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=2010) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 180 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=66)

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2005)

</column>

---

You call out a quick cadence, guiding your allies into a more efficient rhythm. Each willing ally within your marshal's aura is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of their next turn, and they can use the extra action only to Stride. At the end of each ally's turn, if they used the extra action, they then become [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) until the end of their following turn.

<title level="2">Cadence Call leads to...</title>
[Tactical Cadence](/Feats.aspx?ID=2016)
name: Cadence Call
